privacy.subtitle: Valid for: Recipe Pixie ‚Äì an app by Harbor Studios

responsible.title: 1. Responsible Party
responsible.address:

general.title: 2. General Information
general.content1: The protection of your personal data is important to us. This privacy policy explains what data is collected, stored, and used in connection with the use of our app Recipe Pixie.
general.content2: We treat your data confidentially and in accordance with applicable data protection regulations, particularly the GDPR and TTDSG.

dataCollection.title: 3. Collection and Use of Personal Data

appUsage.title: a) When Using the App
appUsage.content: Recipe Pixie only processes data that you provide or actively generate. This includes in particular:
appUsage.item2: recipes and notes that you create yourself
appUsage.item3: optional photos that you upload via camera or gallery
appUsage.purpose: This data is used exclusively to provide the app's functionality: storing, managing, and displaying your own recipes.
appUsage.storage: Data storage and management is handled via Supabase, a European cloud service provider that encrypts and stores data (TLS & AES-256). There is no sharing with third parties for advertising, analytics, or other purposes.

noSharing.title: b) No Sharing with Third Parties
noSharing.content: Personal data is not sold or shared with other companies unless there is a legal obligation to do so.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: Recipe Pixie does not use cookies, analytics, or tracking services. Communication with Supabase occurs exclusively via encrypted HTTPS connections.

storage.title: 5. Data Storage and Deletion
storage.content1: All your content (email, recipes, photos) is securely stored in the Supabase database. You can delete recipes and photos at any time.
storage.content2: You can also delete your entire account ‚Äì directly in the app or via the following link: https://harborstudios.app/data-deletion. After deletion, all personal data and content will be completely removed within 7 days.

rights.title: 6. Rights of Data Subjects
rights.intro: You have the right at any time to:
rights.item3: Request deletion or restriction of processing

changes.title: 7. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content1: We reserve the right to adapt this policy at any time.
changes.content2: The current version is always available at

dataDeletionSection.title: 8. Data Deletion
dataDeletionSection.content: Information on complete deletion of your account can be found here: https://harborstudios.app/data-deletion

dataDeletionCta.title: Want to delete your data?
dataDeletionCta.description: Learn how to completely remove your account and all associated data.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion for Recipe Pixie
dataDeletion.subtitle: Delete your account and all associated data

intro.title: Your Options
intro.content: If you want your personal data to be completely deleted, you have the following options:

inApp.title: In the App
inApp.content: Open Settings ‚Üí Account ‚Üí Delete Account. This will delete your account, email address, all recipes, and photos from the database.

email.title: Via Email
email.content: Send a message to support@harborstudios.app with the subject "Delete Account" and provide the email address used in the app.

timeline.title: Deletion Period
timeline.content: Upon receipt of your request, your data will be completely removed within a maximum of 7 days in accordance with Art. 17 GDPR ("Right to Erasure").

security.title: Data Security
security.content: No personal data is stored permanently or shared with third parties. Storage is exclusively with our service provider Supabase, which manages data in encrypted form and permanently removes it after deletion.

contact.title: Further Questions?
contact.content: For further questions about data processing, please contact us at: support@harborstudios.app

general.title: General Questions
general.a1: Harbor Studios is an innovative software studio specializing in AI-powered web apps, maritime solutions, and gaming projects. We develop digital products that make life easier and more productive.
general.a2: You can reach us through the contact form on our homepage or send an email directly to support@harborstudios.app. We typically respond within 24 hours.
general.a3: Most of our apps offer a free basic version. For advanced features like AI capabilities or unlimited usage, we offer various premium plans.

technical.title: Technical Questions
technical.a1: All our apps work optimally in modern browsers like Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge (latest 2 versions). For the best experience, we recommend Chrome or Safari.
technical.a2: Most of our apps are Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) and offer basic offline functionality. Once you've been online, you can use many features without an internet connection. However, AI features require an internet connection.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.a1: Privacy and security are our top priorities. All data is transmitted encrypted (SSL/TLS) and stored securely. We never sell your data to third parties and strictly comply with GDPR.
privacy.a2: Yes, you can delete all your data at any time in the settings of your apps. Alternatively, you can contact us and we will completely remove your data from our system.

recipePixieGuide.title: Recipe Pixie - User Guide
recipePixieGuide.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Recipe Pixie

registration.title: Registration and Login
registration.content: Create an account with your email address and password. After registration, you can log in directly and start using the app.

credits.title: Credit System
credits.content: New users receive 25 free credits to try out all features. Each recipe creation costs 1 credit. You can purchase additional credits as needed in the app.

interface.title: User Interface
interface.content: The app features an intuitive interface with a bottom navigation bar that provides quick access to recipes, meal planner, shopping list, cookbooks, and settings.

manual.title: Manual Entry
manual.content: Tap the '+' button to create a new recipe. Fill in the required fields and save your recipe.

magicPaste.title: Magic Paste Function
magicPaste.intro: The Magic Paste function is Recipe Pixie's most powerful feature. It allows you to create recipes from almost any source with a single tap.

howTo.title: How it Works
steps: Copy recipe text from any source (website, book, message)
Tap the Magic Paste button in the app
The AI analyzes the text and automatically creates a structured recipe

sources.title: Supported Sources
sources.content: Magic Paste works with texts from websites, cookbooks, handwritten notes, messages, and more. The AI recognizes ingredients, quantities, and instructions regardless of format.

magicPaste.tip: Tip: The more structured the source text, the better the result. But even poorly formatted texts usually work!

nutrition.title: Nutritional Information
nutrition.intro: Recipe Pixie can automatically calculate nutritional values for your recipes.

howTo.title: Automatic Calculation
howTo.content: Tap 'Calculate Nutrition' in the recipe view. The AI analyzes the ingredients and generates a detailed nutritional profile.

view.title: View Recipes
view.content: All your recipes are clearly displayed on the home screen. Use the search function to quickly find specific recipes.

edit.title: Edit Recipes
edit.content: Tap a recipe to view it, then use the edit button to make changes. All fields can be edited afterwards.

delete.title: Delete Recipes
delete.content: Swipe a recipe to the left or use the edit mode to delete recipes. Deleted recipes cannot be restored.

selectionMode.title: Selection Mode
selectionMode.intro: The selection mode allows you to edit multiple recipes simultaneously.

cookbooks.title: Cookbooks
cookbooks.intro: Organize your recipes into thematic cookbooks.

create.title: Create Cookbooks
create.content: Create new cookbooks for different occasions, seasons, or preferences (e.g., 'Summer Salads', 'Quick Dinners', 'Vegan Favorites').

manage.title: Manage Cookbooks
manage.content: Add recipes to multiple cookbooks, edit cookbook names, or delete entire cookbooks.

mealPlanner.title: Meal Planner
mealPlanner.intro: Plan your meals for the week and keep track of what you want to cook.

howTo.title: How to Use
steps: Switch to the Meal Planner tab
Tap on a day and meal
Select a recipe from your collection
The planned meals appear in your calendar

shoppingList.title: Shopping List
shoppingList.intro: Automatically generate shopping lists from your recipes and meal plans.

cookMode.title: Cook Mode
cookMode.intro: A special view for cooking that makes it easier to follow recipes.

mobileApp.title: Mobile App
mobileApp.intro: Recipe Pixie is available as a progressive web app (PWA) and can be installed on your device.

install.title: Installation
install.content: Visit the website in your mobile browser and follow the instructions to add the app to your home screen. This gives you quick access and offline functionality.

tipsTricks.title: Tips & Tricks
tips: Use Magic Paste for quick recipe imports - it works even with handwritten notes you've photographed!
Create cookbooks for different occasions to find recipes faster
The meal planner helps with meal prep and reduces food waste
Shopping lists can be shared with household members
Nutritional values are automatically calculated per serving
You can edit and adjust all fields even after creating a recipe
Use tags to categorize your recipes (e.g., 'quick', 'healthy', 'vegetarian')
